body.name: PayLessHere Lift Top Coffee Table with Adjustable Storage and Hidden Compartment Small Wood Coffee Table Center Table for Home Living Room Office Apartment Reception Room,Brown
features: MINIMAL STYLE: The modern and minimalist design of this living room lift coffee table matches perfectly with the style of your living room and office. The coffee table can be raised from approximately 15.7 inches to 21.1 inches, and the storage coffee table allows you to work or enjoy your coffee at a comfortable angle.

PRACTICAL LIFT DESIGN: This coffee table is equipped with a lift table top, so when you need to work quickly in your living room, simply effortlessly lift the table top up and forward to create a workspace while sitting on the couch. The high quality metal mechanism of the living room table allows the table top to be lifted or lowered with ease and without noise. It's the perfect table for eating, doing homework, anything!

PRACTICAL STORAGE SPACE: Underneath the coffee table top is a hidden storage space to store your frequently used items like magazines, laptops, snacks, etc. and keep them out of the dust. The side of the coffee table also provides two additional open spaces for you to store more things conveniently and save your time. This is a very practical lift up coffee table.

HIGH QUALITY: This lift-up coffee table is made of easy-to-clean, hard-wearing MDF and a sturdy, stable metal frame that is built to last. The high quality air rod system of the lift coffee table allows the table top to be raised and lowered effortlessly and quietly.

EASY INSTALLATION: This elevated center table is easy to install, with the help of the included parts, tools and illustrated assembly instructions, simply follow the steps as directed to complete the installation of your living room table.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1.Quiet design: The gas strut of the coffee table is designed to have stronger stable support for the table top, allowing you to rise and fall effortlessly without noise, avoiding huge shocks or loud noises. 2.Easy to Clean:The coffee table is waterproof, heat and dust resistant and can be kept clean with just a damp cloth. 3.Rugged and stable:The solid wood legs add to the stability of the living room table and are very sturdy and durable.

1.Hidden Compartment：A hidden storage compartment under the coffee table top provides additional storage. You can keep books, magazines, remote controls and other things inside to keep your living space neat and tidy. 2.Open storage shelf：The coffee lift table has an open storage shelf on the side with a removable wooden panel in the middle, perfect for storing books, magazines, coffee cups, computers and other items.

reviews.reviewerName: Whoever said this was easy assembly. Lied. I’ve took this table apart about 5 times and put it together 6.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Most definitely not an easy assembly
reviews.reviewText: Product is not at all easy to put together. I’ve taken it apart and put it back together about 5 or 6 times. Instructions are not clear and holes don’t line up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pieces loose in box
reviews.reviewText: The inside of the box looks like it had already been returned. The instructions were ripped, the pieces were loose, a board is cracked down the center. Piece of styrofoam broken half. The other half is not in the box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Think it through..
reviews.reviewText: There are instructions.They can be unclear. Although they label the items and describe the connectors really well....They do not tell you which side to connect to each piece. If you aren't careful, you will have to take it apart and reassemble slightly differently several times... like I did.I know you are probably feeling pretty confident right now... but, wait...Lol. Best wishes. It looks great assembled.Movement on the lift top isn't smooth, but, maybe, I made a mistake?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Bad instructions and even worse packaging
reviews.reviewText: The instructions were very unclear. The premarked locations for installing the top of the table were completely wrong, resulting in additional drill holes. But the worst offense was the packaging. The plastic straps used to seal the box cut through the box and cut into a wooden panel. Luckily it was a bottom panel and easily hidden. Overall the product is nice once you can get it put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I love this thing! It so hard to understand the instructions and assembly was awful. It also slams shut

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We got it because it was on sale and we're newly weds. Most of the pieces didn't go together correctly, has to screw new holes. It won't close properly and it's very difficult to open. One of the pieces even put a hole through part of the table. We glued it back together the best we could. It looks nice and goes with our aesthetic, but it is a regret buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My other coffee table was real wood but to big for my new apartment.I didn’t want to spend to much $ so this coffee table is great I love the storage,tray,and it’s the perfect size for the area it’s in.Its not real wood but it works much better than my other coffee table !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor quality . Cost appears low but it's actually 67 $ .
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the product is extremely poor . I received damaged product. Assembling is extremely difficult and the markings are miss aligned and Yes shipping Charges of 29$ makes it too expensive for what we get .
